feed.title: Cal.com Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.8.8
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore: new /help folder by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18342
  • Delete help directory by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18343
  • chore: moved docs/help to /help by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18345
  • chore: Delete unused guides directory by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18346
  • feat: booking filters by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18303
  • chore: Remove HeadSeo components where no longer needed + improve app router metadata logic by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18348
  • chore: app router - /bookings status page by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18183
  • perf: Optimize i18n instance caching in App Router by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18309
  • feat: virtual queues tab in insights by @CarinaWolli in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18260
  • feat: update translations via @replexica by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18361
  • fix: update OOO e2e tests to remove flakiness by @vijayraghav-io in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18367
  • fix: metadata is overwritten for child managed eventType when updating parent by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18059
  • chore: added routing support link by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18369
  • chore: refactor handling logic for embeds in app router and add a test by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18362
  • feat: Plain chat by @nizzyabi in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18284
  • fix: discrepancy in description hyperlinks and calendar invite by @asadath1395 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18365
  • fix: Recurring meeting creates increasing number of Zoom events by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18360
  • fix: Last used label in button shown in 2-factor code and backup screen by @asadath1395 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18341
  • feat: add name and email url params when rescheduling past bookings by @kart1ka in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18318
  • fix: update contact email for CalDAV by @alishaz-polymath in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18351

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.8.7...v4.8.8

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.8.9
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: plain chat removed from mobile devices by @nizzyabi in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18377
  • perf: /router endpoint perf improvement by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18366
  • fix: Route Builder field input looses focus on typing by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18381
  • chore: rely less on autoinfer, use initial data types in consumers by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18359
  • perf: getAvailableSlots improvements - 1 by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18382

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.8.8...v4.8.9

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.8.10
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: Handle more dry-run cases by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18286
  • perf: improve checkIsAvailable in getAvailable slots by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18352
  • feat: update translations via @replexica by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18389
  • fix: removed plain chat from app.cal.com/video by @nizzyabi in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18385
  • fix: Localized date format for the payment page by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18388
  • refactor: email handler by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18391

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.8.9...v4.8.10

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.8.11
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: reduce mobile navigation bottom margin by @devin-ai-integration in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18398
  • fix: embed showing chat by @nizzyabi in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18404
  • revert: "fix: update OOO e2e tests to remove flakiness" by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18411
  • fix: add typeform logo and fix alt text in /apps/typeform/how-to-use by @ShashankGupta10 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18393
  • chore: reduce test time for onboarding e2e test by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18403
  • fix: flaky OOO tests without time dependency by @vijayraghav-io in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18412

New Contributors

  • @devin-ai-integration made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18398
  • @ShashankGupta10 made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18393

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.8.10...v4.8.11

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.8.12
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: Error changing location to Cal Video by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18401
  • fix: Team availability view fetch duplicate data & breaks UI by @cnhhoang850 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18416
  • chore: Migrate /403 and /500 pages to App Router by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18424
  • fix: Some recently discovered type errors breaking build by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18432
  • fix: Add to google leads to a 403 page by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18430
  • feat: Add dry run mode message during the booking process. by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18429
  • fix: atoms globals.css invalid class format by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18295
  • chore: migrate /icons page to App Router by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18436
  • fix: booker atom booking fields by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18441
  • feat: apply full width automatically for DataTable by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18357
  • feat: update translations via @replexica by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18438
  • fix: get bookings ordering by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18439
  • fix: improve useInViewObserver hook to trigger when observer is in view on mount by @cnhhoang850 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18446
  • fix: react incompatiblity with nextjs error by @retrogtx in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18433
  • fix: Zoho Bigin not pulling information from booking by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18445
  • fix: Enhance SCIM payload handling and attribute creation by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18427
  • fix: Timezone in Email Embed not working #15525 by @acharyayush in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15537
  • feat: server side sorting for insights routing by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18113
  • chore: Salesforce - Add additional logging and error checks by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18448
  • fix: improve App Store filters & misaligned arrow indicators by @cnhhoang850 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18455
  • fix: Show managed event bookings for team admins/owners by @alishaz-polymath in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18434

New Contributors

  • @cnhhoang850 made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18416
  • @acharyayush made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15537

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.8.11...v4.8.12
